name: When Will You die?
description:
Hello everybody!

(FOR THE UPDATES YOU HAVE TO SCROLL BELOW)

This is my first game what I want to really publish. All in all I made only two games and this is the second one.  I hope, you will like this short demo version. 

In this game you can play with two levels, you can see some features, level design, some enemies what you have to fight against. 

I would like to tell some future-features: 

Jinns and medusas will range enemies.

I would like to make a better menu, with options and load game.

There will be saving system. 

I would like to create all in all 9 main levels, after every third with a boss room plus secret levels. 3 levels like this first, 3 like this second, the other three levels are suprise ;) In every 3 level-series you will get different enemies, so it follows on that there will be much more kind of enemies! Oh yes, about the enemies: now you can run across them, but I will change it in the future, there will be a stomping system (if you touch them or jump on their head, you will get damage, if you hit them, they will jump back) 

In the future you won't see, where a secret wall is. You have to find it. 

I plan to make more platformer-tasks, power-ups, a minimal story-line, NPC interactions. 

Lot of work is behind me, but much more in front of me. I'm going foward and I do what I have to do.

If you would like to follow me, you can make it here:

https://www.facebook.com/murissimurissi

First Update:

  1. Some Enemies are weaker than the original version.
  2. Changed Main Menu and Endscreen background.
  3. Changed wordtype to longer sections. The description is shorter.
  4. Changed Lizard hitbox.
  5. Changed ladder up speed.
  6. Darker button color when the button touched by mouse.
  7. temporarily turned off the music/effectsounds because of sound problem.
